data.markdown:
🤩 Have you talked to Kai today? She’s Kyte’s AI assistant made just for small businesses

 [Check it out!](https://www.kyteapp.com/artificial-intelligence-kai?utm_term=sticky-bar) [Check it out!](https://www.kyteapp.com/artificial-intelligence-kai?utm_term=sticky-bar)

[![Kyte logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60870ff4852ead369670e13e/60870ff4852eadba2b70e3bd_logotest.svg)](https://www.kyteapp.com/)[Download now for free](https://pos.auth.kyteapp.com/signup)

Kyte for Computer

## More than just a POS – it's your partner for success

We've created a system that's easy to use, yet packed with features to supercharge your business. Kyte Web offers a **multiplatform experience**. Whether on your PC, tablet, or mobile device, management and sales are easier than ever.

[![ponto de vendas](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60870fec5b198a263fa79bcb/648c72d17322092a6d163476_compra%20no%20site.svg)\\
Point of sale on your computer with artificial intelligence](https://www.kyteapp.com/kyte-for-pc#feature-1) [![relatórios de venda](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60870ff4852ead369670e13e/651efdba6bb7f6d238b9f374_ana%CC%81lise.svg)\\
Manage products and discounts in bulk for maximum efficiency](https://www.kyteapp.com/kyte-for-pc#feature-2) [![cadastro de clientes](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60870ff4852ead369670e13e/651efdba6bb7f6d238b9f373_clientes%20vip.svg)\\
Close contact with customers and ease of printing receipts](https://www.kyteapp.com/kyte-for-pc#feature-3)

Revolutionize your point of sale

### Efficiency redefined: Kyte on computer

With Kyte Web, your point of sale experience takes a giant leap forward. Our centralized dashboard brings you the power of a fully functional POS system on your computer, streamlining your operations.

Our goal is for you to sell faster and more organized. It's the simplicity and ease of Kyte on a larger screen with unique features.

#### Savvy product descriptions with AI

Use Kyte's technology and boost your sales with rich and engaging product descriptions.

[Learn more](https://www.kyteapp.com/pricing#3.1-features)

#### Speed up your sales with barcode reader

Add items to the cart in seconds, even if they aren't registered in the system yet.

[Learn more](https://www.kyteapp.com/manage/order-management-system)

![Kyte Web with AI](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60870ff4852ead369670e13e/6514a1bc7fadfe222b4b3512_Kyte%20artificial%20intelligence.webp)

### Start Your 7-day Free Trial Now

Transform your sales experience and maximize efficiency with our seamless POS.

[Create your account](https://web.auth.kyteapp.com/signup) [Download for free](https://pos.auth.kyteapp.com/signup)

![Kyte Web with sales reports](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60870ff4852ead369670e13e/6542907a70ddbb36ac59e9c6_Kyte%20Web%20EN%20-%20estati%CC%81sticas_b.webp)

Empowering tools to thrive

### Streamline your management with bulk actions

Kyte for PC puts you in the driver's seat when it comes to managing your inventory. With bulk actions, you can import, update, or remove products and customers effortlessly. And, right on the same screen, you'll have all the crucial inventory information you need.

#### Comprehensive inventory overview

Take a glance at all the vital details about your stock, from quantities available to products running low, all on a single screen.

[Learn more](https://www.kyteapp.com/manage/inventory-management)

#### Insightful reports and graphs

Visualize your business data with professional reports and graphs, enabling you to make better decisions and drive your business forward.

[Learn more](https://www.kyteapp.com/manage/sales-report-analytics)

[Create your account](https://web.auth.kyteapp.com/signup) [Download for free](https://pos.auth.kyteapp.com/signup)

Seamless customer relations

### Build stronger customer connections

Managing customer data is a breeze with Kyte Web. Import and export customer information with ease, ensuring your relationships are always up-to-date.

#### More options for configuring and printing receipts

Connect any USB printer to Kyte Web and print receipts that match your brand perfectly.

[Learn more](https://www.kyteapp.com/selling/receipts)

#### See everything: all products and customers

Access every piece of data, even the parts your mobile can't handle due to device memory constraints.

[Learn more](https://www.kyteapp.com/sales/pos-system)

[Create your account](https://web.auth.kyteapp.com/signup) [Download for free](https://pos.auth.kyteapp.com/signup)

![Kyte Web with inventory control](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60870ff4852ead369670e13e/651f23f6079423d2646d76fe_Kyte%20Web%20EN%20-%20estoque.webp)

We care about your data, and we'd use cookies only to improve your experience. By using this website, you accept our [**Cookies Policy**](https://www.kyteapp.com/privacy-policy)

[Agree](https://www.kyteapp.com/kyte-for-pc#)

What's New

## Dive into Kyte's latest features

Check out Kyte's newest tools designed to supercharge your experience and revolutionize your business.

![new order tracking on new catalog](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60870ff4852ead369670e13e/69179e977cc3e0a5874a7962_en_imagem_Kai_02.webp)

### Kai, Kyte’s AI on WhatsApp

Focused on small businesses, it works as a 24/7 assistant that identifies opportunities, handles time-consuming tasks, and much more.

[Learn more](https://www.kyteapp.com/artificial-intelligence-kai)

![product variations](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60870ff4852ead369670e13e/685da0efd8c677a09a16781f_variation-wizard-EN.webp)

### POS with Product Variations

No more mess when registering, managing inventory, or selling your products. Sell by color, size, or model in a simple, efficient, and fast way.

[Learn more](https://www.kyteapp.com/selling/pos-system)

![cash flow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60870ff4852ead369670e13e/673612d3b50c451f9944b454_Fluxo%20de%20Caixa%20EN.webp)

### Cash Flow Report

Find out if more money is coming into your business than going out. Improve your financial control with a clearer view of your cash flow.

[Learn more](https://www.kyteapp.com/managing/cash-flow-control)

Reviews

## What Kyte users say

Check out the reviews of some of our customers who are taking charge of their own business.

"I loved my free trial. I fell in love with this app and had no choice but to purchase it. I love the receipt system, the stock feature, and the barcode. Until you try this, you won't understand. A must-have for your business."

![Kyte customer](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60870ff4852ead369670e13e/64e504998a8328ed0d26f69f_Sadika.webp)

Sadika McKenzie

[Jamaica, Central America](https://appfollow.io/gp/387117/review/735159202)

"This is easier to use compared to other POS apps. You can monitor and adjust your stock anytime. The online catalog is better than other POS. Highly recommended."

![Kyte customer](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60870ff4852ead369670e13e/64e5070e5051d2ec9c7501cf_Almen.webp)

Almen Panomblayan

[Saudi Arabia, Asia](https://appfollow.io/gp/387117/review/845999498)

"This app has everything we need: product cost, selling price, inventory value, different levels of access to sellers, online catalog, and FB/IG integration. What else do we need?"

![Kyte customer](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60870ff4852ead369670e13e/64e50920481ecad4267174d4_Angeline.webp)

Angeline Lim

[Malaysia, Asia](https://appfollow.io/gp/387117/review/761731233)

"I am extremely pleased. My whole team finds it easy to navigate and use, even the non-tech-savvy ones. The customer service staff are incredibly helpful and quick to respond to any minor issues or questions."

![Kyte customer](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60870ff4852ead369670e13e/64e507a8b626fb28a86c163c_Jonathan.webp)

Jonathan Miljure

[Canada, North America](https://appfollow.io/gp/387117/review/1375096864)

"This is a perfect app. It's what I've been looking for for a long time... It's got all the functions I need. I can send a catalog of all my products to clients for online orders."

![Kyte customer](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60870ff4852ead369670e13e/64e50a4c87c34811410e4efa_Rawlings.webp)

Rawlings Scott

[Nigeria, Africa](https://appfollow.io/gp/387117/review/428814478)

"It's never been so much easy to set up a POS and online ordering system. I have full control of my staff and sale and I can keep a good record of my customers. I highly recommend it to those who are looking for online POS."

![Kyte customer](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60870ff4852ead369670e13e/64e50af07b471ab3b703450f_Adnan.webp)

Adnan Afzal

[Pakistan, Asia](https://appfollow.io/gp/387117/review/790654696)

Support

## Frequently Asked Questions

The main questions about the product and subscription options

What is Kyte?

Kyte is a sales and management system on phone, tablet and/or computer. It has special tools so you can offer the best shopping experience to your customers. It combines efficiency and modernity with an intuitive and easy-to-use interface. [Read a review about us.](https://fixthephoto.com/kyte-pos-app-and-system-review.html)

Do I need to download Kyte on my computer to use the web version?

No. Kyte Web is accessed from your browser. You don't have to worry about installing programs or apps on your computer to use Kyte for PC.

Is there any discount?

Yea! In the annual modality of the PRO, GROW, and PRIME plans, we offer a 2-month discount. You pay for 10 months and enjoy all the features for 1 year.

Does Kyte charge commission on orders?

No! You pay no commission for in-person or online sales. For online payments, there is only the card transaction processing fee.

Will I be charged when the trial period ends?

No. We don’t ask for any payment information when you start using the Kyte App. You will only be charged when you are ready to subscribe to the PRO, GROW or PRIME plan. If you don’t subscribe, you will automatically be put on the free plan.

Does the subscription automatically renew?

Yes, Kyte operates on an automatic subscription renewal basis. This means that at the end of each month or year, your subscription is automatically renewed without any need for you to worry.

Can I cancel whenever I want?

Yea! We don’t work with contracts. You can cancel at any time without any difficulty. If you’ve paid for the entire year, but you want to cancel before the 12 months are up, don’t worry. We refund unused months (with the exception of installment annual subscriptions).

__llm_logo_reasoning.reasoning: Selected #0 because it is visible, located in the header, matches the brand name 'Kyte', and links to the homepage, making it the primary brand logo.

primary.reasoning: Button #1 ('Create your account') is the primary CTA because it uses the vibrant brand color (#2DD1AC) and has action-oriented text encouraging user engagement.

secondary.reasoning: Button #2 ('Log in to Kyte Web') is secondary as it has a different background color (#FFFFFF) and serves a supportive function for existing users.

rawLogoSelection.selectedLogoReasoning: Selected #0 because it is visible, located in the header, matches the brand name 'Kyte', and links to the homepage, making it the primary brand logo.
